abstract:
The true infection rate of COVID-19 and the infection fatality rate in the whole population have been estimated for each country. The estimate well coincided with local surveys. The fact that several tens of times, or more, of identified cases are already infected might require reconsideration of the strategy.
Competing Interest Statement
author: Takamichi Kanbayashi; Masahito Kobayashi; Masahiro Sonoo; Hideyuki Hayashi; Takayoshi Shimohata
title: Estimation of the true infection rate and infection fatality rate of COVID-19 in the whole population of each country
